headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: BOSTON, March 20, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period January 1, 2025 to March 31, 2025, payable on April 30, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 31, 2025.

raw.headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: BOSTON, March 20, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period January 1, 2025 to March 31, 2025, payable on April 30, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 31, 2025.
